courses.title: Intro to Music Production
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of recording, arranging, and mixing using modern DAWs like Ableton Live, FL Studio, and Logic Pro.

courses.title: Mixing & Mastering Essentials
courses.description: Master EQ, compression, reverb, and stereo imaging to make your tracks sound professional and polished.

courses.title: Sound Design with Synths
courses.description: Explore the art of creating unique sounds using synthesizers, samplers, and sound manipulation techniques.

courses.title: Music Production Workflow
courses.description: Learn how to optimize your production process from idea to final track with efficient tools and techniques.
